ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MMS 2 Electric Double Probe (EDP) Spacecraft Potential, Fast Survey
ResourceHeader.Description: Electric Double Probe, Dual Probe Spacecraft Potential, Level 2, Fast Survey Data. Spacecraft potential is etstimatrd by averaging measurements of the probe-to-spacecraft potential from several probes.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: J. Burch, R. Ergun, P. Lindqvist

InformationURL.Name: The MMS Scientific Investigation, SMART, home page at Southwest Research Institute (SwRI)
InformationURL.Description: The Magnetospheric Multiscale (MMS) Scientific Investigation home page. The MMS Scientific Investigation is called Solving Magnetospheric Acceleration, Reconnection, and Turbulence (SMART). The web page is hosted by the Southwest Research Institute (SwRI).

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via ftp from SPDF.

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via http from SPDF.

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Access to ASCII, CDF, and plots via NASA/GSFC CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: J. Burch, R. Ergun, P. Lindqvist. Please acknowledge the data providers and CDAWeb when using these data.

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time
Parameter.Description: Epoch Time Tags, Interval Centered, in Terrestrial Time 2000 (TT2000)
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter exhibits an increasing monotonic progression.

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Potential
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: MMS2_EDP_EPOCH_FAST_L2

Parameter.Name: Average Probe to Spacecraft Potential
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: MMS2_EDP_EPOCH_FAST_L2
Parameter.Description: Average of the Probe to Spacecraft Potential Values, Level 2, Fast Survey

Parameter.Name: Probe to Spacecraft Potential, Individual Probe
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: MMS2_EDP_EPOCH_FAST_L2
Parameter.Description: Probe to Spacecraft Potential, Individual Probes, Level 2, Fast Survey

Parameter.Name: Status Bitmask
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: MMS2_EDP_EPOCH_FAST_L2
Parameter.Description: Status Bitmask, Values Used: Bitmask & 0x001: True when probe(s) are disabled, Bitmask & 0x002: True when probe(s) have bad bias settings, Bitmask & 0x004: True when probe(s) are saturated, Bitmask & 0x008: True when probe(s) are saturated due to low density, Bitmask & 0x016: True when probe(s) are sweeping bias, Bitmask & 0x032: True when SDP probe(s) are in shadow from the ADP booms, Bitmask & 0x064: True when ASPOC is emitting non-zero current

Parameter.Name: Data Quality indicator
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: MMS2_EDP_EPOCH_FAST_L2
Parameter.Description: Data Quality Indicator: 4, Best; 3, Good; 2, Data OK, Use with some Caution; 1, Bad Data, Use with Caution; 0, Really Bad Data or No Data

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time Delta Plus/Minus
Parameter.Description: The Time Interval of Data Measurements is given by the Epoch Time Tags and Delta Plus/Minus
